au.gov.ga.conn4d.impl.readers

Class Boundary_Raster_NetCDF

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.gov.ga.conn4d.impl.readers.Boundary_Raster_NetCDF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Boundary, Boundary_Raster, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Boundary_Raster_NetCDF
extends java.lang.Object
implements Boundary_Raster, java.lang.Cloneable
    Reads 2-dimensional surface values from a NetCDF Grid source.
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor accepting a path name provided as a String, and also accepting Strings defining the variable names for the latitude and longitude dimensions.
